result.reason: Current UI limits reconnection attempts to 200. The underlying RDP extended reconnection logic supports higher values, so the UI limit should be increased to allow more attempts as requested.
result.approach: Increase numRdpReconnectionCount.Maximum to 10000 in ConnectionsPage.Designer.cs to fully leverage the existing extended reconnection logic.
